actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to remove the criminal penalty from title XI, section 1101, Hazards of Air Commerce.

summary.text: Removes the criminal penalties under the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 for violation of the requirement for adequate public notice of the construction or alteration of any structure where notice will promote safety in air commerce. Prescribes civil penalties in lieu of such criminal penalties. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 1501)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to remove the criminal penalty from title XI, section 1101, Hazards of Air Commerce.
